turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello there, how can i help u?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what type of pizza did u want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to get a medium four medium pizzas. I want one of them sausage and then two pepperoni and then one with mushrooms and vegetables.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, so let me read that back to u to confirm i got it right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 4 medium pizzas, 1 sausage, 2 pepperoni, 1 with mushroom and veggies.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did u have a crust preference for all of these?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to a regular crust but I also want extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it. i'll add that in the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did u want extra cheese on all of them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. thanks for confirming. the total for this order is $56.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do u want to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sounds good. i've placed the order. the 4 medium pizzas will be ready in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do u need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: cool.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: take care.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
